HSRMod:Energy.NAME: Charge
DESCRIPTIONS: Maximum is #b%d. Some cards require #yCharge to use.

HSRMod:Toughness.NAME: Toughness
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage received is reduced by #b%d %%, stacking up to #b%d.
Damage received is increased by #b%d %%, stacking up to #b%d.

HSRMod:Broken.NAME: Broken
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases damage taken by #b%d %% and reduces damage dealt by #b%d %%. At the start of the turn, remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:Frozen.NAME: Frozen
DESCRIPTIONS: When there are #b%d stacks (1/2/3 for normal/elite/BOSS enemies):
All stacks are removed at the start of the turn and the turn is skipped. NL After taking damage from card, remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:FrozenResistance.NAME: Frozen Resistance
DESCRIPTIONS: Requires additional #b%d stacks to trigger #bFrozen .

HSRMod:Bleeding.NAME: Bleeding
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. At the start of the turn: take #b%d ( #b%d %% max HP, up to #b%d ) physical damage (1), remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:Burn.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take #b%d fire damage (1), remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:Shock.NAME: Shock
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take #b%d lightning damage (1), remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:WindShear.NAME: Wind Shear
DESCRIPTIONS: DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take #b%d ( #b%dX , X equals to the amount, up to #b5 ) wind damage (1), remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:Imprison.NAME: Imprison
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt is reduced by #b%d %%. At the end of the turn, remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:Entangle.NAME: Entangle
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds 1 stack when taking damage, up to #b%d stacks. At the start of the turn, remove all stacks and take damage equal to the number of stacks * #b%d.

HSRMod:BreakEffect.NAME: Break Effect
DESCRIPTIONS: Break damage is increased by #b%d. DoT damage to Broken enemies is increased by #b%d.

HSRMod:BreakEfficiency.NAME: Break Efficiency
DESCRIPTIONS: Toughness reduction is increased by #b%d %%. At the end of the turn, remove 1 stack.
Toughness reduction is increased by #b%d %%. At the end of the turn, if more than #b%d stack, remove 1 stack.

HSRMod:Aftertaste.NAME: Aftertaste
DESCRIPTIONS: After a Follow-Up card deals its first damage, deal #b%d damage to the target, and stack 1. Reset to 1 at the end of turn.

HSRMod:Suspicion.NAME: Suspicion
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases damage over time taken by #b%d %%. Stacks up to #b%d.

HSRMod:Quake.NAME: Quake
DESCRIPTIONS: Trigger when taking the first damage in a monster's turn: remove 1 layer to deal physical damage to it ( #b%d ) with damage equal to your block left.

HSRMod:Spore.NAME: Spore
DESCRIPTIONS: Up to #b%d stacks. At the start of the turn, remove 1 stack. Burst when targeted by an attack card: remove all stacks, take X*X (#b%d) wind damage (1).

HSRMod:Boost.NAME: Boost
DESCRIPTIONS: Up to #b%d stacks. Damage dealt + #b%d. NL After taking normal damage, all stacks are removed.

HSRMod:BrainInAVat.NAME: Brain in a Vat
DESCRIPTIONS: After consuming [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , remove 1 stack and recover an equal amount of [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] .

HSRMod:Reinforce.NAME: Reinforce
DESCRIPTIONS: When taking damage, if you have Block, gain a #yGirl #yPower card.
When taking damage, if you have Block, gain #b%d Block and a #yGirl #yPower card.

HSRMod:TopazNumby.NAME: Difficulty Paying?
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b2 #yFollow-Up, gain *Trotter *Market!?.
For every #b2 #yFollow-Up, gain *Trotter *Market!?+.

HSRMod:Aventurine.NAME: Blind Bet
DESCRIPTIONS: When taking damage, if you have Block, stack #b%d. After Follow Up, stack #b%d, up to 10 stacks. When amount >=7, lose 7 amount and gain #yBingo!.

HSRMod:Robin.NAME: Vox Harmonique, Opus Cosmique
DESCRIPTIONS: After using an attack card, gain Strength equal to the cost of that card. At start of next turn, remove this effect and Strength gained through this effect.

After using an attack card, gain Strength equal to the cost of that card, and gain #b20 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] if it is a Follow-Up card. At start of next turn, remove this effect and Strength gained through this effect.

HSRMod:ProofOfDebt.NAME: Proof of Debt
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage from Follow Up cards is increased by #b%d. The target of the Follow Up attack is prioritized.

HSRMod:WisemansFolly.NAME: Wiseman's Folly
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, if #yCogito #yErgo #ySum is not in your hand, remove it. Upon removal, consume all #yCogito #yErgo #ySum cards in your hand.

HSRMod:BattlefieldMagician.NAME: Battlefield Magician
DESCRIPTIONS: After chasing, gain #b%d Block.
After playing a Follow Up card, gain #b%d Block.

HSRMod:SlaughterhouseNo4RestInPeace.NAME: Slaughterhouse No'4: Rest in Peace
DESCRIPTIONS: Toughness reduction of Follow up damage +1. After dealing Follow Up damage, if the target has #yBroken, there is a #b%d%% chance to draw 1 card.
Toughness reduction of Follow up cards +1. After dealing damage through Follow Up card, if the target has/doesn't have #yBroken, there is a #b%d%% / #b20%% chance to draw 1 card.

HSRMod:UselessScholar.NAME: Useless Scholar
DESCRIPTIONS: After chasing, if you have any, there is a #b%d %% chance to consume #b%d [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] and Follow Up another Follow Up card.
After playing a Follow Up card, if you have any, there is a #b%d %% chance to consume #b%d [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] and Follow Up another Follow Up card.

HSRMod:BountyHunter.NAME: Bounty Hunter
DESCRIPTIONS: After chasing, there is a #b%d %% chance that the card will return to your hand.
After playing a Follow Up card, there is a #b%d %% chance that the card will return to your hand.

HSRMod:ThanatoplumRebloom.NAME: Thanatoplum Rebloom
DESCRIPTIONS: When losing #yBroken, remove 1 stack and prevent it.

HSRMod:Trailblazer5.NAME: Treasure of the Architects
DESCRIPTIONS: After the first damage dealt by a played card, if the target has #yBroken, deal break damage equal to the toughness reduction amount.

HSRMod:Trailblazer6.NAME: Action Beats Overthinking
DESCRIPTIONS: When dealing toughness reducing damage, if the target has #yBroken , increase the damage by the absolute value of its #yToughness .

HSRMod:Firefly.NAME: In Finalized Morrow, I Full Bloom
DESCRIPTIONS: After breaking the target, deal break damage equal to its max toughness and gain 1 stack of #yBreak #yEfficiency. Add the card #yFalling #yFrom #yA #yShattered Sky to your hand.

HSRMod:Befog.NAME: Befog
DESCRIPTIONS: After being broken, recover #b%d [E] , draw #b%d cards.
After being broken, recover #b%d [E] , draw #b%d cards, and upgrade all cards in hand.

HSRMod:Symbiote.NAME: Symbiote
DESCRIPTIONS: After break, if first time on this turn, gain [E] [E] . NL  After dealing break damage, draw 1 card.
After break, if first time on this turn, gain [E] [E] , otherwise, gain [E] . NL After dealing break damage, draw 1 card.

HSRMod:VoyageMonitor.NAME: Voyage Monitor
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b%d toughness reduced, gain 1 block.

HSRMod:IntersegmentalMembrane.NAME: Intersegmental Membrane
DESCRIPTIONS: For each [E] used, gain #b%d Block.
For each [E] used, gain #b%d Block. If your Block is less than 10, gain an additional 1 Block.

HSRMod:Kolchis.NAME: Kolchis
DESCRIPTIONS: Recover [E] for every #b%d Charge used.

HSRMod:Divinity.NAME: Macro-segregation
DESCRIPTIONS: You are immune to Dexterity and Frail. Incoming Block gain +#b%d, and only #b%d%% of Block is lost at the start of each turn.

HSRMod:Burden.NAME: Burden
DESCRIPTIONS: After becoming the target of a card, remove 1 stack and recover [E] . Remove all stack at start of turn.

HSRMod:Huohuo.NAME: Tail: Spiritual Domination
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing a card, recover 1 temp HP, 10 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , and remove 1 stack of a random negative effect.
After playing a card or exhausting [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , recover 1 temp HP, 10 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , and remove 1 stack of a random negative effect.

HSRMod:Epiphany.NAME: Epiphany
DESCRIPTIONS: When triggering DoT effects, the stack is not removed, but 1 stack is removed at the end of the turn.

HSRMod:SlashedDream.NAME: Slashed Dream
DESCRIPTIONS: After using a card, if it applied a debuff, stack 1 , stacking up to 12. NL At the end of the turn, if amount >=9, lose 9 amount and bounce 3 times: deal #b%d lightning damage (1) to random enemies; finally, deal #b%d + X lightning damage (1) to all enemies (X equals the number of its debuffs).
I  #rweep  #rfor  #rthe  #rdeparted.
Dusks  #rrain,  #rit  #rtoo  #rshall  #rfall.

HSRMod:AllThingsArePossible.NAME: All Things are Possible
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing an attack card, apply 1 DoT effect that the target doesn't already have.
After playing an attack card, if the target has all DoT effects, randomly trigger one. Otherwise, apply 1 that it doesn't already have.

HSRMod:AnExtraPersonsDiary.NAME: An Extra Person's Diary
DESCRIPTIONS: Toughness reduction value of DoT +1. After breaking the target, apply 1 random negative effect X times (X is the first digit of its max toughness).
Toughness reduction value of DoT +1. After breaking the target, apply 1 random negative effect X times, and gain [E] (X is the first digit of its max toughness).

HSRMod:ReignOfKeys.NAME: Reign of Keys
DESCRIPTIONS: When enemies trigger DoT effects in their turn, draw 1 card. If it triggers in your turn, stacks are not reduced.
When enemies trigger DoT effects, draw 1 card, if it is in your turn, stacks are not reduced.

DESCRIPTIONS: After the enemy takes DoT, apply #b%d stacks of #ySuspicion.
After the enemy takes DoT, apply #b%d stacks of #ySuspicion. When applying DoT to enemies, apply #b%d stacks of #ySuspicion.

HSRMod:CommonMortal.NAME: Common Mortal
DESCRIPTIONS: After consuming [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , apply 1 DoT effect to a random enemy. When you apply a DoT effect, gain #b%d [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] .
After consuming [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , apply 1 DoT effect to a random enemy. When you apply a negative effect, gain #b%d [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] .

HSRMod:MatrixOfPrescience.NAME: Matrix Of Prescience
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage received - #b%d %%.

DESCRIPTIONS: When breaking Block, gain 1 layer of #yQuake .
When dealing damage to an enemy with Block, gain 1 layer of #yQuake .

HSRMod:Trailblazer7.NAME: Treasure of the Architects
DESCRIPTIONS: When using a #gskill card, gain #b%d block.
When using a #gskill card, gain #b%d block, for every enemy that has Block, gain 1 more.

HSRMod:Trailblazer8.NAME: Action Beats Overthinking
DESCRIPTIONS: When playing a card, gain a #yQuake with damage equal to the block value of the card (if more than 0).
When playing a card, gain a #yQuake+ with damage equal to the block value of the card (if more than 0).

HSRMod:EmpyreanImperium.NAME: Empyrean Imperium
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b%d times the leftmost card is played, draw 1 card.
For every #b%d times the leftmost card is played, draw 1 card. Cards costing more than 0 count as 2 cards.

HSRMod:RadiantSupreme.NAME: Radiant Supreme
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon using card, stack 1 for each condition met: 1. Single-target, 2. Attack card. For every #b%d layer stacked, draw 1 and gain 2 #yBoost.
Upon using card, stack 1 for each condition met: 1. Single-target card, 2. Attack card, 3. Upgraded card. For every #b%d layer stacked, draw 1 and gain 2 #yBoost.

HSRMod:SovereignSkybreaker.NAME: Sovereign Skybreaker
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon using card, stack 1 for each condition met: 1. Single Target, 2. Skill card. For every #b%d layer stacked, a random card's cost -1 for this turn, and gain 3 #yBoost.
Upon using card, stack 1 for each condition met: 1. Single Target, 2. Skill card, 3. Upgraded card. For every #b%d layer stacked, a random card's cost -1 for this turn, and gain 3 #yBoost.

HSRMod:Prey.NAME: Prey
DESCRIPTIONS: for every #b%d attack cards played against the target, remove 1 layer and add #yCelestial #yDive, #yWing #yClip on top of draw pile

HSRMod:PhenolCompounds.NAME: Phenol Compounds

After playing the next card this turn, recover [E] equal to its cost and apply that many layers of #ySpore to a target.

HSRMod:SerfOfCalamity.NAME: Serf of Calamity

HSRMod:ExcitatoryGland.NAME: Excitatory Gland

HSRMod:SMR2Amygdala.NAME: SMR-2 Amygdala

HSRMod:LoadStriatedCortex.NAME: Load: Striated Cortex

When playing an AoE attack card, if there are only 1/2/3 enemies, damage +9/6/3.

DESCRIPTIONS: Upon break, adjust toughness to #b%d.
Upon break, adjust toughness to #b%d, and gain [E].

HSRMod:Tribbie.NAME: Guess Who Lives Here

After playing an attack card, for every target hit, deal !M! damage to the target with most health.

Casting ult, releasing in #b%d turns. #yBreak to interrupt. NL %s

HSRMod:WalkInTheLight.NAME: Walk in the Light

Damage received is reduced by #b%d%%. When #yBroken, or when a monster dies, remove 1 stack, recover all #yToughness, and the player gain #b%d temporary HP, #b%d Block and an #yImprison card. At 0 stacks, damage received is increased by #b%d%%.
Damage received is increased by #b%d%%.

HSRMod:AlienDream.NAME: Alien Dream
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt is reduced by #b%d%%, and is converted to heal for #b%d%% of the damage dealt. When taking damage, remove 1 stack, and the damage taken is increased by #b%d%% (not shown in intent).

HSRMod:Summoned.NAME: Summoned
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon taking fatal damage, the boss loses #yToughness equal to the #yToughness limit of the owner, and loses #rHP equal to the #rHP limit of the owner.

HSRMod:MultiMove.NAME: Multi-Move
DESCRIPTIONS: Move #b%d times more next turn. #yBreak to interrupt.

HSRMod:AbundanceLotus.NAME: Non-Destructing
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon taking fatal damage, remove all #yFasting , and gain [E] twice that amount.

HSRMod:DestructionLotus.NAME: Black Prana's Return

HSRMod:MoonRage.NAME: Moon Rage

HSRMod:Irate.NAME: Irate
DESCRIPTIONS: Player/Owner gains 1 stack when taking damage. When reaching #b%d/0 stacks, remove all stacks, and all monsters/players immediately take an extra turn.
Irate triggered! All monsters taking an extra turn!
Irate triggered! Player taking an extra turn!

HSRMod:Terror.NAME: Terror
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you draw a card, a random card's cost + #b%d for this turn. When removed, all cards' cost + #b%d for this turn.

HSRMod:Sunset.NAME: Sunset
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing #b%d cards, remove this power, end the turn, and all cards in hand will be stolen.

HSRMod:Nightfall.NAME: Nightfall
DESCRIPTIONS: Next #b%d cards played will be exhausted.

HSRMod:SlumberAwakening.NAME: Slumber Awakening

[ #rSanction #rMode ] #yToughness can not be reduced.
